questions.questionText: Which of the following filter is used to convert an input string to date format.
questions.explanation: date filter is used to convert an input string to date format.

questions.questionText: Which of the following filter is used to convert input to all uppercase?
questions.explanation: uppercase filter is used to convert the input to all uppercase.

questions.questionText: Which of the following is true?

options.text: Angular 2 Services can be used to add more data to an Angular JS class.
Angular 2 Metadata can be used to add more data to an Angular JS class
Angular 2 Components can be used to add more data to an Angular JS class.

questions.explanation: Angular 2 Metadata can be used to add more data to an Angular JS class.
AngularJS is perfect for Single Page Applications (SPAs).

questions.questionText: What is the use of Angular Controllers in the application?

options.text: Angular controllers are used for controlling the data.
Angular controllers are used for displaying the data.
Both of the above are correct.
None of the above is correct.

questions.explanation: Angular controllers are used to control the data.
